faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help.

q1.question: Do these numbers work for all services?
q1.answer: Our numbers are real SIM-card based numbers, which means they work with almost all major services including WhatsApp, Telegram, Google, Facebook, and more. However, some services may have specific restrictions.

q2.question: How long do I keep the number?
q2.answer: You keep the number for the duration of your selected rental period. We offer options ranging from 15 minutes to 30 days depending on your needs.

q3.question: Is my payment information secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard encryption and never store your full payment details. We also support cryptocurrency payments for maximum privacy.

q4.question: Can I receive calls?
q4.answer: Currently, our service is optimized for SMS verification only. Voice calls are not supported at this time.

q5.question: Do you offer refunds?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer refunds if you don't receive any SMS within the rental period. Please contact support with your order details.
